works.description: At the Design Hunting Gallery, organized by Audi and New York Magazine during this year’s ICFF in New York City, design duo Bonetti/Kozerski presented the rocking LL2 lounger. This rocking leather chaise lounge looks great for armchair surfing, and comes complete with a Bluetooth-operated sound system integrated into the headrest. Designers Enrico Bonetti and Dominic Kozerski were present at Drive-In Studios to explain the features and advantages of their ultimate creation.
